name: Run for your life! (TobiasPerkowski)
description:
Run for your life! is a short runner made in TIC-80 for the Trijam #124.  

In this game, you (the grey one) compete against 3 other runners in a crazy race, where every 10 seconds the last one is blown up.

Controls: up or spacebar - jump

it's my first time in a game jam, so any feedback would be very apreciated!
